.. _`design_system_components_email`:

Email
=====

.. figure:: images/component_email.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

Email component that displays an email address. It also provides the action for sending an email to the individual address via the mailto: protocol.


API Documentation
-----------------

:ref:`cs-web-components-base-formcontrols.Email.__module__`


Related Components
------------------

:ref:`design_system_components_form`
